name: Life is Short (mmenke)
description:
I made this game as my final for my Game Scripting 2 class. You play as a fly that will die very quickly. However, you get multiple flies per level. Additionally, your previous flies corpses' can be used to progress through the levels!

Notes: I have no idea why the timer and life counter appear in the middle of the screen. It should be in the corner. 

Additionally, there is an odd bug where your fly will have some "rebound" from touching other objects. 

Game will also have to be exited manually.
